SEARCH
Package user

Interface UserActions

All Known Implementing Classes:
Admin, Customer, User
public interface UserActions
Interface that defines actions for a user. This interface provides methods for displaying menus, showing concert timings, ticket costs,booking information, and calculating total prices. author Yoshikazu Fujisaka

  • Method Details

    • mainMenu

      void mainMenu(ArrayList<concert.Concert> concerts, HashMap<String,concert.Venue> venues, ArrayList<booking.Booking> bookings, int... concertId)
      Displays the main menu for the user and handles user input.
      Parameters:
      concerts - A list of concerts.
      venues - A map of concert IDs to their corresponding venues.
      bookings - A list of bookings.
      concertId - The ID of the concert.

    • printMenu

      void printMenu()
      Displays the menu options for the user.

    • showTimings

      void showTimings(ArrayList<concert.Concert> concerts, HashMap<String,concert.Venue> venues, ArrayList<booking.Booking> bookings)
      Displays the timings and availability of concerts.
      Parameters:
      concerts - A list of concerts.
      venues - A map of concert IDs to their corresponding venues.
      bookings - A list of bookings.

    • showTicketCost

      void showTicketCost(concert.Concert concert)
      Displays the ticket costs for different zones in a concert.
      Parameters:
      concert - The concert whose ticket costs are to be displayed.

    • showTicketCostHelper

      void showTicketCostHelper(double[] price)
      Helper method to display ticket costs for a specific zone.
      Parameters:
      price - An array containing the prices for left, center, and right seats in the zone.

    • findBooking

      ArrayList<booking.Booking> findBooking(ArrayList<booking.Booking> bookings, String concertId)
      Finds bookings for a specific concert.
      Parameters:
      bookings - A list of all bookings.
      concertId - The ID of the concert for which bookings are to be found.
      Returns:
      A list of bookings for the specified concert.

    • showBooking

      void showBooking(concert.Concert concert, ArrayList<booking.Booking> correspondingBookings)
      Displays booking details for a specific concert.
      Parameters:
      concert - The concert for which booking details are to be displayed.
      correspondingBookings - A list of bookings for the specified concert.

    • showTicketInfo

      void showTicketInfo(ArrayList<booking.Booking> bookings)
      Displays detailed ticket information for a list of bookings.
      Parameters:
      bookings - A list of bookings.

    • calculateTotalPrice

      double calculateTotalPrice(booking.Booking booking)
      Calculates the total price for a booking.
      Parameters:
      booking - The booking for which the total price is to be calculated.
      Returns:
      The total price of the booking.
